## Methods

### Analysis method

**Correlational analysis** used to test how student lifestyle habits relate to academic performance

### Technique

-   **Pearson correlations** drawn using `cor()` in R
-   Created **bubble-style** plots using `corrplot()` to visualise magnitude and direction of relationships
-       <span style="color:blue">Blue</span> = Positive relationship
-       <span style="color:red">Red</span> = Negative relationship
-       Circle size = Relationship strength
